definitions.definition: The longest river in France , passing (from southeast to northwest) through the departments of Ardèche , Haute-Loire , Loire , Saône-et-Loire , Allier , Nièvre , Cher , Loiret , Loir-et-Cher , Indre-et-Loire , Maine-et-Loire and Loire-Atlantique .
A department of Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes , France . Capital: Saint-Étienne .
